title: Leaverbuster
body: Hi there, today 8/13/2016 I was attempting to play a ranked game when my client began to lag during champ select. This is not uncommon for me so I did not think anything of it. Until it came my turn to pick and the client lagged when I pushed the lock in button. It turned as if I had clicked it and then stayed greyed out while the timer ran down. So I was penalized with low priority queue because I technically "dodged" even though the client was the cause of this issue. Normally I would just wait and move on but I was slapped with a THIRTY MINUTE penalty instead of the normal 6 or whatever. This is ridiculous, some people don't have much time to play and a 30 minute penalty can mean am entire game that I won't get to play this weekend for something that was entirely not my fault.

replies.body: Lagging in champion select suggests a poor network, and can cause you to lose sync or disconnect entirely.  It is really important that this is resolved, and not risk getting a [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) for it.  I suggest going through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for a list of steps to get this fixed up for good.  Otherwise, consistently leaving like this will continue to escalate your lower priority queue.  Let me know if you have any questions!
LMAO LOOK AT THE NUMBER OF PEOPLE HAVING SAME ISSUES, DAMN APPARENTLY ALL OF OUR NETWORKS ARE BAD.
